issue.title: [Rust] Add support for DictionaryArray types to cast kernels
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10164](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10164). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This ticket tracks the work to support casting to/from DictionaryArray's, (my usecase is DictionaryArray's with a Utf8 dictionary). 

There is prototype work on https://github.com/alamb/arrow/tree/alamb/datafusion-string-dictionary

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10164?focusedCommentId=17210526) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8346
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8346>
